posts.post_title: WTS: T206 Ty Cobb (green port.) PSA 8mc /  Cy Young SGC 86 Tolstoi
posts.post_content:
Cy Young SGC 86 (Tolstoi) Perfectly centered $15,000
Ty Cobb PSA 8mc (SCap 150) Taking offers...

Taking offers, straight sale or T206 trades..Both of these cards have extremely clean backs...Please email or PM, scans below...These cards have been in my collection for over 12 years and have not been on the market ever...thanks, any questions call me 229-630-1686

Wow, awesome cards!

Question on the Cobb; is that a hint of "Cobb, Detroit" on top?
man, that cy young is mind blowing!

wow awesome cards, it does look like a 2ed name on top.  Dosnt look like cobb, but the guys name looks to end with a  y.  from what i can see

hmmm 5 letters ends in a y

  Barry Jack - Barry Shad, Carey Scoops, Casey Doc, Duffy Hugh,Pelty Barney

EK- that's a comma you see "Cobb, Detroit"

Kevin- nice cards. email sent.
